10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Masud said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'A man should not be led in prayer in his place of authority, and no one should sit in his place of honor except with his permission

chapter.eng-name: When people are together and one of them is the ruler
